Class DomTextLayer

java.lang.Object

      org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser.DomTextLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.canvas.Layer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrowserLayer
public abstract class DomTextLayer
extends org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.canvas.AbstractLayer

A class that implements text rendering by positioning DIVs with text or images over the canvas.
